title: TableRowCountToBeBetween
description: This schema defines the test TableRowCountToBeBetween. Test the number of rows to between to two values.

minValue.description: Expected number of rows should be greater than or equal to {minValue}. If minValue is not included, maxValue is treated as upperBound and there will be no minimum number of rows

maxValue.description: Expected number of rows should be lower than or equal to {maxValue}. if maxValue is not included, minValue is treated as lowerBound and there will eb no maximum number of rows
